titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Elias B. Harrington papers, 1819-1869

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University

did.abstract: Business papers including bills, promissory notes, deeds, other legal documents, and many summonses to appear in court for nonpayment of debts.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.p: Elias B. Harrington Papers, 1819-1869, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.p: This finding aid was derived from a MARC record using a crosswalk defined in marc2ead_sectionA.xsl. The finding aid was generated as part of a larger project to digitize several thousand small collections housed in Section A, November 2021.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Elias B. Harrington was a resident of Fayetteville, North Carolina.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Business papers including bills, promissory notes, deeds, other legal documents, and many summonses to appear in court for nonpayment of debts.

controlaccess.subject: Debtor and creditor -- North Carolina -- Fayetteville
